name: Ricotta Pudding
keywords: coffee liqueur, confectioners' sugar, ricotta, dessert, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 pound fresh ricotta, drained if very moist
1/4 cup confectioners' sugar, or more to taste
3 tablespoons coffee liqueur, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, beat together the ricotta and sugar, then add liqueur. Taste and add more sugar or liqueur as desired. Divide among 6 glass ramekins or other small bowls and refrigerate until ready to serve. Serve, dusted with a little powdered cocoa.
